duckdb/ducklake

integrated data lake and catalog format built on SQL and Parquet

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • GitHub repo for DuckDB, an in-process SQL database system for analytics
  • Table format for managing data in data lakes with SQL-like capabilities
  • Database manager for SQL and NoSQL across platforms
  • React building blocks for browser data analytics with DuckDB
  • Cloud-native lakehouse framework for real-time analytics
  • Distributed time series database for scalability
  • Stream processing engine using SQL, DuckDB, and Apache Arrow
  • Server for DuckDB with MySQL and Postgres protocols
  • Relational database for multiplayer games
